attributes.action: Downgrade Local Council Leaders salary - How can they earn more than the prime minister?
attributes.additional_details: Published today the figure that our local chief executive is on £245,000 a year with pension and bonuses but the prime minister is on £145,000. How can someone who looks after a district be on more than someone who looks after the country? Also Coventry are cutting services to people with learning diffculties yet two council members got pay rises whilst 16,000 staff have pay freezes. Its a farce
